description: It looks amazing, and I’m pretty sure it opened perfectly just now on my Linux Mint machine. I uess I will need to install more synths and watch a tutorial but for beginners it really needs 1. to startup with a basic rock beat number (kick on 1 and 3, snare on 2 & 4) ready to go so they It looks amazing, and I’m pretty sure it opened perfectly just now on my Linux Mint machine. I uess I will need to install more synths and watch a tutorial but for beginners it really needs 1. to startup with a basic rock beat number (kick on 1 and 3, snare on 2 & 4) ready to go so they can test their setup instantly. 2. I press play and see the transport moving but it is silent. I’d like to click a metronome but i cant find one. 3. It needs text labels under the icons (preferred) if not as tooltips (workable). 4. just now I found the metronome. It is a blue coloured icon. I remember by colour. I can’t hear it but it’s enabled. I can see that master output has level seems to be at 60 bpm. 5. i just clicked “monitor” so its green. Still no sound. 6. No use of pull-down menus, a common UI method. 7. it would be nice if “add track” MIDI/Audio had been done once for new files. 8. last but not least actually most importly like Logic 9 if I press Caps-lock it would rad if I could jam on my computer keyboard to hear synth.can test their setup instantly. 2. I press play and see the transport moving but it is silent. I’d like to click a metronome but i cant find one. 3. It needs text labels under the icons (preferred) if not as tooltips (workable). 4. just now I found the metronome. It is a blue coloured icon. I remember by colour. I can’t hear it but it’s enabled. I can see that master output has level seems to be at 60 bpm. 5. i just clicked “monitor” so its green. Still no sound. 6. No use of pull-down menus, a common UI method. 7. it would be nice if “add track” MIDI/Audio had been done once for new files. 8. last but not least actually most importly like Logic 9 if I press Caps-lock it would rad if I could jam on my computer keyboard to hear synth.
summary: So much promise but hard to soundcheck

description: En cada nueva versión de Ubuntu pruebo este programa.

Secuenciador de midi y grabador de audio multipista, sencillo de usar. Le hace falta algunas herramientas básicas para manipulación de audio porque se centra más en trabajar con midi. Pero creo que tiene lo esencial para producir, componer y grabar música sin muchas complicaciones. Requiere Jack para funcionar.
L'application ne s'éxecute pas sur fedora 40 avec gnome
De la merdasse profonde ! Or, j'arriva à lire les midis sur windows ! Mise à mort !
summary: Ne fonctionne pas du tout sous ubuntu

description: It works great and can open all types of virtual synths. It just need more functions to create more acurate music. Better velocity note editing than Ardour .
Manque de stabilité, mais je suis pas un pro, on s'en fiche un peu
